channel.title: So i got an idea
channel.description:
well first off p hats r worth so much but u get no bonus? n e 1 wanna tell me how to edit bonuses? also i wanted to edit the "perfect' ring ( aka p ring) so it gives u 10k bonuses on everything but i wanted it only available to admins... how would i do this? i also wanted simaler rings for mods and regular players
1 other thing im new to having r own server thing... how do i change what ppl say

item.title: So i got an idea
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ring")) { { if playerRights = 3) addItem(773, 1); } else if playerRights = 0 PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " wants a perfect ring, we'll give him a kick instead!"); disconnected = true; appendToBanned(); } }

Very Loud ROaR

Read full topic

=P hope that helps you it just kicks not banns all you had to do was like he said remove the appendtobanned(playername); thing…

~metal~

item.title: So i got an idea
item.dc:creator: @The_Mentor The Mentor
item.description:
@The_Mentor wrote:

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("ring")) { { if playerRights = 3) addItem(773, 1); } else if playerRights = 0 PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " wants a perfect ring, we'll give him a kick instead!"); appendToBanned(playerName); disconnected = true; } }That would make it so that only people with player rights of 3 could be able to do the command without getting kicked and banned. If you don’t want the command to ban them just delete the appendToBanned(playerName); part.

Read full topic

item.title: So i got an idea
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

There should be three numbers like this

334.3445654_45465.343454_35.3354466_0_0_0_0_0_0_0 Etc.

The first three numbers are the High/Low Alch values and the shop price. The next ten are the item’s bonus’. First five are for Attack, next 5 are for Defence and the last 2 are for Strength & Prayer.

Lexii:

ok so i found the perfect ring in the item.cfg…how do i change the bonses?

Change the italic numbers, don’t change the bold numbers, those are the High/Low Alch values and the shop values. Change the small numbers after that, I’m supposing the Perfect Ring hasn’t got any bonus’ changed because in the sources, they don’t tend to fix the bonus’ of items that aren’t used much. They might be numbers like 3, 4 or more.

Read full topic

item.title: So i got an idea
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

every thing at first (but the command deals with the item.cfg file just go in find the item you want to change and change it not to hard huh? and the way to make the ring for only admins is add this command

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pring") && playerRights = 2) { addItem(ItemID, ItemAmount); sendMessage("heres your ring dont abuse it noob cake"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName+" is a noob who just got a pring watch out for him); }

and basically the same thing for all the other rings if you want

Read full topic
